data.text: @AlYap73961573 @Vicki_Kunkel @slipperymarbles @str8shooter123 @starleyfar @WSJ @FDACBER @Novavax Like when FDA was ready to approve vaccination to kids with Pfizer even with poor results?
@Vicki_Kunkel @slipperymarbles @str8shooter123 @AlYap73961573 @starleyfar @WSJ @FDACBER @Novavax FDA has a small single bed, no room for a third party in it.
@AlYap73961573 @Vicki_Kunkel @slipperymarbles @starleyfar @WSJ @FDACBER @Novavax I meant traveling to get Novavax. 😜

@str8shooter123 @Vicki_Kunkel @slipperymarbles @starleyfar @WSJ @FDACBER @Novavax There is no option - unless you want mRNA vax - then that's your only option. You can get an mRNA jab anytime.  I'm waiting, because I'm not putting another mRNA vax inside me.

@AlYap73961573 @Vicki_Kunkel @slipperymarbles @starleyfar @WSJ @FDACBER @Novavax Then why is it taking so long? 2-3 x the length of the other 3? I want to have hope but Iâ€™m looking at other options now.

@Vicki_Kunkel @slipperymarbles @str8shooter123 @starleyfar @WSJ @FDACBER @Novavax FDA has not rejected Novavax, and the Novavax liaison to the FDA confirmed the requirements are complete. We must not lose hope.
@slipperymarbles @str8shooter123 @AlYap73961573 @starleyfar @WSJ @FDACBER @Novavax Makes it seem as if the FDA all along never planned to give EUA to Novavax.

@slipperymarbles @str8shooter123 @AlYap73961573 @starleyfar @WSJ @FDACBER @Novavax Also: Other countries have had just as much paperwork to go through and they managed quick approvals of Novavax. Last year, I recall an interview where Stan said the FDA told him he might be better off just going for full approval--and not EUA--because other vaxs were first.
